{"id":1513911263,"question_id":3674,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 weeks, 4 days","timestamp":1737317549,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"38 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1513911263/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Non-Decreasing Subarrays After K Operations","memory":"142.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long countNonDecreasingSubarrays(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        reverse(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        deque<int> dq;\n        int start = 0;\n        int end = 0;\n        long long reqOps = 0;\n        long long ans = 0;\n        for( ; end<nums.size(); end++ ){\n            while( !dq.empty() && nums[end] > nums[dq.back()] ){\n                int curr = dq.back();\n                dq.pop_back();\n                int next = !dq.empty()? dq.back(): start-1;\n                reqOps += (long long) ( nums[end] - nums[curr] ) * (long long)(curr-next);\n            }\n            //cout<<start<<\" \"<<end<<\" \"<<reqOps<<endl;\n            dq.push_back( end );\n            while( !dq.empty() && reqOps > (long long)k ){\n                reqOps -= (long long) ( nums[dq.front()] - nums[start] );\n                if( dq.front() == start )\n                    dq.pop_front();\n                start++;\n            }\n            //cout<<start<<\" \"<<end<<\" \"<<reqOps<<endl;\n            ans += ( end - start + 1 );\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-non-decreasing-subarrays-after-k-operations","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
